entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Étape 6:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Wind: NW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow overnight. Fog. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
